trans-unit.source: Provides a Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) implementation of the RSA algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma implementação de Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) do algoritmo RSA.

trans-unit.source: The RSACng class is derived from the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA> class.
trans-unit.target: A classe de RSACng deriva da <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA>classe.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, it is not a drop-in replacement for existing uses of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider>.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte, não é uma substituição de drop-in para os utilizadores existentes de <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider>

trans-unit.source: RSACng uses a programming model that is similar to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDsaCng> class rather than the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider> class.
trans-unit.target: RSACng utiliza um modelo de programação que é semelhante da <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDsaCng>classe em vez da <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider>classe.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDsaCng>

trans-unit.source: For example: - The key used by RSACng is managed by a separate <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey> object.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo:-a chave utilizada pelo RSACng é gerida por um separado <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>objeto.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>

trans-unit.source: In contrast, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider> has a key that is directly tied to the operations of the type itself.
trans-unit.target: Em contrapartida, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider>tem uma chave que esteja ligada diretamente para as operações do tipo de si próprio.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider>

trans-unit.source: - RSACng performs such operations as signing and verifying signatures by using properties of the RSACng object, just as <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDsaCng> uses its object properties to control signing and verification operations.
trans-unit.target: -RSACng efetua operações como iniciar sessão e verificar assinaturas utilizando as propriedades do objeto RSACng, tal como <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDsaCng>utiliza as respetivas propriedades do objeto para controlar a assinatura e operações de verificação.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDsaCng>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSACng"></xref> class with a random 2,048-bit key pair.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSACng"> </xref> classe com um par de chaves 2,048-bit aleatório.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSACng"></xref> class with a randomly generated key of the specified size.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSACng"> </xref> classe com uma chave gerada aleatoriamente o tamanho especificado.

trans-unit.source: Valid key sizes range from 384 to 16,384 bits, in increments of 8.
trans-unit.target: Intervalo de tamanhos de chave válido de 384 bits 16.384, em incrementos de 8.

trans-unit.source: We recommend that a minimum size of 2,048 bits be used for all keys.
trans-unit.target: Recomendamos que um tamanho mínimo de 2.048 bits utilizada para todas as chaves.

trans-unit.source: The size of the key to generate in bits.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho da chave a gerar em bits.

trans-unit.source: keySize is not valid.
trans-unit.target: keySizeNão é válido.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSACng"></xref> class with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSACng"> </xref> classe com a chave especificada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.AlgorithmGroup%2A?displayProperty=fullName> of `key` must be <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngAlgorithmGroup.Rsa%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.AlgorithmGroup%2A?displayProperty=fullName>de `key` tem de ser <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngAlgorithmGroup.Rsa%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngAlgorithmGroup.Rsa%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.AlgorithmGroup%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a copy of the key.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor cria uma cópia da chave.

trans-unit.source: Even if `key` is disposed, the copy of this key object in RSA remains alive.
trans-unit.target: Mesmo se `key` é eliminado, a cópia deste objeto de chave RSA permanece ativo.

trans-unit.source: The key to use for RSA operations.
trans-unit.target: A chave a utilizar para operações de RSA.

trans-unit.source: key is not a valid RSA key.
trans-unit.target: keyNão é uma chave RSA válida.

trans-unit.source: key is .
trans-unit.target: keyis .

trans-unit.source: Decrypts input data using the specified padding mode.
trans-unit.target: Desencriptar dados utilizando o modo de preenchimento especificado de entrada.

trans-unit.source: The data to decrypt.
trans-unit.target: Os dados a desencriptar.

trans-unit.source: The padding mode.
trans-unit.target: O modo de preenchimento.

trans-unit.source: The decrypted data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados desencriptados.

trans-unit.source: data is .
trans-unit.target: datais .

trans-unit.source: -or- padding is .
trans-unit.target: -or- padding is .

trans-unit.source: padding does not equal <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Pkcs1%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, or else the of padding does not equal .
trans-unit.target: paddingNão é igual a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAEncryptionPadding.Pkcs1%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, caso contrário, o de padding não é igual a .

trans-unit.source: Decrypts the input data using the private key.
trans-unit.target: Desencripta os dados de entrada utilizando a chave privada.

trans-unit.source: The cipher text to be decrypted.
trans-unit.target: O texto de cifra a desencriptar.

trans-unit.source: The resulting decryption of the rgb parameter in plain text.
trans-unit.target: A desencriptação resultante do rgb parâmetro em texto simples.

trans-unit.source: This method call is not supported.
trans-unit.target: Esta chamada de método não é suportada.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Encrypts the input data using the specified padding.
trans-unit.target: Encripta os dados de entrada através de preenchimento especificado.

trans-unit.source: The data to encrypt.
trans-unit.target: Os dados a encriptar.

trans-unit.source: The padding mode.
trans-unit.target: O modo de preenchimento.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:System.Byte> .
trans-unit.target: Devolve <xref:System.Byte>.</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: data is .
trans-unit.target: datais .

trans-unit.source: -or- padding is .
trans-unit.target: -or- padding is .

trans-unit.source: padding does not equal <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding.Pkcs1%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding.Pss%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: paddingNão é igual a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding.Pkcs1%2A?displayProperty=fullName> ou <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding.Pss%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Encrypts the input data using the public key.
trans-unit.target: Encripta os dados de entrada utilizando a chave pública.

trans-unit.source: The plain text to be encrypted.
trans-unit.target: O texto simples para ser encriptada.

trans-unit.source: The resulting encryption of the rgb parameter as cipher text.
trans-unit.target: A encriptação resultante do rgb parâmetro como texto de cifra.

trans-unit.source: This method call is not supported.
trans-unit.target: Esta chamada de método não é suportada.

trans-unit.source: Exports the key used by the RSA object into a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAParameters"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Exporta a chave utilizada pelo objeto RSA para uma <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAParameters"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include private parameters; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para incluir parâmetros privados; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The key used by the RSA object.
trans-unit.target: A chave utilizada pelo objeto RSA.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Replaces the existing key that the current instance is working with by creating a new <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey"></xref> for the parameters structure.
trans-unit.target: Substitui a chave existente se a instância atual está a funcionar com criando uma nova <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey"> </xref> para a estrutura de parâmetros.

trans-unit.source: If `parameters` contains only an exponent and modulus, only a public key is imported.
trans-unit.target: Se `parameters` contém apenas um exponente e módulo, apenas uma chave pública é importada.

trans-unit.source: If `parameters` also contains P and Q values, a full key pair is imported.
trans-unit.target: Se `parameters` também contém os valores P e Q, uma chave completa par é importado.

trans-unit.source: The RSA parameters.
trans-unit.target: Os parâmetros RSA.

trans-unit.source: parameters contains neither an exponent nor a modulus.
trans-unit.target: parameterscontém nem um expoente nem um módulo.

trans-unit.source: parameters is not a valid RSA key.
trans-unit.target: parametersNão é uma chave RSA válida.

trans-unit.source: -or- parameters is a full key pair and the default KSP is used.
trans-unit.target: - ou - parameters é um par chave completa e a predefinição KSP é utilizado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the key that will be used by the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSACng"></xref> object for any cryptographic operation that it performs.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a chave que será utilizada pelo <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSACng"> </xref> objeto para qualquer operação criptográfica que executa.

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey> object is disposed if the key is reset, for instance by changing the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.KeySize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, by using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA.ImportParameters%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to create a new key, or by disposing of the parent <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA> object.
trans-unit.target: O devolvido <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>o objeto foi eliminado se a chave é reposta, para a instância alterando o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.KeySize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade, utilizando o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA.ImportParameters%2A?displayProperty=fullName>para criar uma nova chave, ou por disposing do principal <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA>objeto.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA.ImportParameters%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.KeySize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you should ensure that the key object is no longer used in these cases.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte, deve garantir que o objeto de chave já não é utilizado nestes casos.

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey> object is not the same as the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey> object passed to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACng.%23ctor%2A> constructor, if that constructor was used.
trans-unit.target: Isto <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>o objeto não é igual a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>transmitido um objeto para o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACng.%23ctor%2A>construtor, se essa construtor foi utilizado.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACng.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>

trans-unit.source: However, it will point to the same CNG key.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, irá apontar para a mesma chave CNG.

trans-unit.source: The key used by the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSACng"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A chave utilizada pelo <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSACng"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the key exchange algorithm available with this implementation of RSA.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do algoritmo de troca de chaves disponível com esta implementação de RSA.

trans-unit.source: Returns "RSA".
trans-unit.target: Devolve "RSA".

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the signature algorithm available with this implementation of RSA.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do algoritmo de assinatura disponível com esta implementação de RSA.

trans-unit.source: Returns "RSA".
trans-unit.target: Devolve "RSA".

trans-unit.source: Signs data that was hashed by using the specified hashing algorithm and padding mode.
trans-unit.target: Dados de sinais que foi protegido por hash utilizando o algoritmo hash especificado e o modo de preenchimento.

trans-unit.source: The hash to sign.
trans-unit.target: O hash para iniciar sessão.

trans-unit.source: The hash algorithm name.
trans-unit.target: O nome do algoritmo de hash.

trans-unit.source: The padding mode.
trans-unit.target: O modo de preenchimento.

trans-unit.source: The signed data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados assinados.

trans-unit.source: hash is .
trans-unit.target: hashis .

trans-unit.source: -or- padding is .
trans-unit.target: -or- padding is .

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithmName.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of hashAlgorithm is or <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: O valor da <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithmName.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> propriedade hashAlgorithm é ou <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: padding does not equal <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding.Pkcs1%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding.Pss%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: paddingNão é igual a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding.Pkcs1%2A?displayProperty=fullName> ou <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding.Pss%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Verifies data that was signed and already hashed with the specified algorithm and padding mode.
trans-unit.target: Verifica os dados que foi assinados e já transformada em hash com o algoritmo especificado e o modo de preenchimento.

trans-unit.source: The hash to verify.
trans-unit.target: O hash para verificar.

trans-unit.source: The signature of the data.
trans-unit.target: A assinatura dos dados.

trans-unit.source: The hash algorithm name.
trans-unit.target: O nome do algoritmo de hash.

trans-unit.source: The padding mode.
trans-unit.target: O modo de preenchimento.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the signature verifies for the hash; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>se verifica a assinatura para o hash; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: hash is .
trans-unit.target: hashis .

trans-unit.source: -or- signature is .
trans-unit.target: -or- signature is .

trans-unit.source: -or- padding is .
trans-unit.target: -or- padding is .

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithmName.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of hashAlgorithm is or <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: O valor da <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithmName.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> propriedade hashAlgorithm é ou <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: padding does not equal <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding.Pkcs1%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding.Pss%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: paddingNão é igual a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding.Pkcs1%2A?displayProperty=fullName> ou <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSASignaturePadding.Pss%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: -or- The signature is badly formatted.
trans-unit.target: - ou - a assinatura é formatada incorretamente.

trans-unit.source: (In the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/add/includes/net-v46-md.md)] and 4.6.1 only; starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v462](~/add/includes/net-v462-md.md)], the method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if a signature is badly formatted.
trans-unit.target: (No [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/add/includes/net-v46-md.md)] e 4.6.1 só; começando com o [!INCLUDE[net_v462](~/add/includes/net-v462-md.md)], o método devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se uma assinatura está formatada incorretamente.
